title: Relates to criminal penalties for election misconduct
summary: Conforms the punishment for crimes under the election law to similar crimes in the penal law; provides that all misdemeanors under article 17 shall be class A misdemeanors, and all felonies shall be class E felonies within the meaning of section 55.10 of the penal law.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to criminal penalties for election misconduct
